page.title: 01POPULATION
page.content: APPROXIMATELY 80% OF THE AREA COVERED BY OUR BLOCK IS AGRICULTURAL LAND.THE MAIN GROUND COVERED IS CROPS WITH A VERY LOW PROPORTION OF THE LAND BEING GIVEN OVER TO GRAZING FOR COWS AND SHEEP, ONLY ABOUT 10%.THE LARGEST AREA OF A SINGLE BUILDING WITHIN OUR BLOCK IS COVERED BY STRATHMARTINE HOSPITAL AND IT'S ADJOINING FARM,HILLHOUSES. THE POPULATION LIVE ALMOST ENTIRELY ALONG THE LINE OF THE OLD RAILWAY LINE WHICH IS NOW NO LONGER IN USE.SOME OF THE PEOPLE WORK ON FARMS IN THE AREA, WHILE QUITE A NUMBER ARE EMPLOYED BY THE HOSPITAL AS NURSES,AUXILIARIES,AND MAINTENANCE STAFF.ABOUT 50% OF THE POPULATION HAVE TO COMMUTE INTO DUNDEE FOR THEIR EMPLOYMENT. AFTER OUR CHILDREN HAVE COMPLETED THEIR FIRST SEVEN YEARS OF EDUCATION THEY GO ON TO KIRKTON HIGH SCHOOL.
